name: antidote
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a chemical, especially a drug, that limits the effects of a poison: Sales of nerve gas antidotes increased dramatically before the war.
a way of preventing or acting against something bad: Regular exercise is the best antidote to tiredness and depression.

a chemical, esp. a drug, that acts against the bad effects of a poison to limit the harm it can do: an antidote for snake venom
fig. An antidote is also a way of preventing or acting against something bad: Exercise can be an antidote to depression.
